sentence: Last November, Paul Gosar, Republican representative for Arizona, was officially censured by the House after sharing an animated video depicting him killing the Democratic Congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and attacking Biden.” Shannon Watts, founder of the group Moms Demand Action for Gun Sense in America, slammed the ad as “disgusting”: DISGUSTING: Former Rep. Gabby Giffords was shot and and seriously wounded 10 years ago.
author: Alex Henderson
title: Arizona Republican Senate hopeful slammed as 'disgusting' for violent campaign ad

sentence: The 2021 America First Political Action Conference was addressed by Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ).
author: Bob Brigham
title: Arizona Republican hyping far-right event featuring notorious white nationalist: report

sentence: Representative Liz Cheney, of Wyoming tweeted: "As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling."
author: Andrew Stanton
title: Mitt Romney Blasts Greene, Gosar: 'Missing a Few IQ Points'

sentence: Arizona Congressman Paul Gosar, a Republican from Prescott, gave a brief video address, a far cry from last year, when he was the featured speaker.
author: Jim Small
title: Arizona Republican said white nationalists are ‘patriots’ and called for hanging political enemies

sentence: In addition to Rogers, who is expected to be censured by the Arizona State Senate, Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ) appeared at AFPAC.
author: Jackson Richman
title: Arizona Republican Posted Anti-Semitic Photoshop Before Speaking at White Nationalist Event

sentence: GOP Reps. Paul Gosar and Marjorie Taylor Greene also spoke at his controversial conference over the weekend.
author: Alex Griffing
title: GOP-Controlled AZ Senate Censures Trump-Backed Republican Lawmaker Wendy Rogers

sentence: While Lake did not respond to questions about Rogers, she has not distanced herself from Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ), who spoke at the same Nick Fuentes' white nationalist America First Political Action Conference in Florida.
author: Bob Brigham
title: Censured Republican is so toxic she’s become an issue in Arizona governor’s race: report

sentence: Rep. Paul Gosar was reportedly scheduled to attend a far-right conference with ties to white nationalists the day of Adolf Hitler’s birthday before his campaign appeared to back out.
author: Sebastian Murdock
title: Rep. Paul Gosar Was Scheduled To Attend Far-Right Event On Hitler's Birthday: Report
